reviews.review: Bob's ur uncle
Broken game but very addictive!

I used to enjoy this game as playing killer only, but since then the game has grown stale and has introduced nothing to be worthy of a second chance. If you have played this before and enjoyed your time go ahead, but if you're expecting something new then it is probably best to look somewhere else.

The game was kinda hard as a survivor until i got better skills and some friends to play with the load time for solo survivor is a little long but when you get friends its almost instantly... but playing as a killer was the absolute best thing i loved chasing other players down its no doubt a rush when you get in a chase with someone.. also wait time for killer is a decent bit of waiting just depends on what time you play. I recommend it for anyone looking to kill time and get a great rush
Muy buen juego, la tension esta bien lograda, lo recomiendo

It's the game that once you get, you can never really leave no matter how bad it gets, how much it pisses you off, makes you question your self existence & makes you flush whatever self esteem you had down the toilet. 

Since I've first started playing it, it's had its huge downs & pretty high ups. Does it still have a lot of issues & things it needs to fix? Oh yeah. Do I still enjoy playing it? Absolutely. Do I hate myself playing it sometimes & curse a lot? Haha yupp. I've made a lot of lasting friendships from this game, met some really great people in the community & also a fair amount of really bad people. There's no lying this community can be super toxic & a pain in the butt. Will we ever be happy with the game & not be able to pick something out about it thats "wrong"? Ask me in another year. Is there anything else like this? Not thus far. 

I'd say I don't recommend it because the hours I've put into this game could honestly be spent better elsewhere so save yourself the addiction, cause once you get it & play it, you're hooked.

Ranking System is a joke, high rank games will still have people who don't know what they're doing making the game boring and frustrating (both for survivors and killers).

Devs will make changes that nobody asked for and make the game less enjoyable and go through with them despite overwhelming negative feedback.

This game definitely isn't for me anymore, but I hope one day it can return to what I remember it as

Really fun horror game, its not too scary for those that are not a big fan of horror. I love all of the different perks and abilities for killer and for survivors, and it makes a fun twist on every game. One problem is the custom matches, because it would be nicer if you could downgrade some of the overpowered max level perks that you get for free. Still 10/10, one of my favorite games.

An outstandingly unique game play loop with a terrifying first experience that'll instantly get you hooked [i] [b] *wink* [/b] [/i] and an abundance of content; with even more added regularly on a bimonthly basis, created by people with a great art direction that shows clear attention and care put into every environment and character they work on. All tied together with a rewarding, seemingly never ending, yet somewhat tedious, grind that provides a consistent sense of growth.
